org.apache.flink.runtime.resourcemanager

接口 ResourceManagerGateway

  • 所有超级接口:
    FencedRpcGateway<ResourceManagerId>, RpcGateway
    所有已知实现类:
    MesosResourceManager, ResourceManager, StandaloneResourceManager, YarnResourceManager

    public interface ResourceManagerGateway
extends FencedRpcGateway<ResourceManagerId>
    The ResourceManager's RPC gateway interface.

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerJobManager

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<RegistrationResponse> registerJobManager(JobMasterId jobMasterId,
                                                                                ResourceID jobMasterResourceId,
                                                                                java.lang.String jobMasterAddress,
                                                                                JobID jobId,
                                                                                Time timeout)
        Register a JobMaster at the resource manager.
        参数:
        jobMasterId - The fencing token for the JobMaster leader
        jobMasterResourceId - The resource ID of the JobMaster that registers
        jobMasterAddress - The address of the JobMaster that registers
        jobId - The Job ID of the JobMaster that registers
        timeout - Timeout for the future to complete
        返回:
        Future registration response

      • requestSlot

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> requestSlot(JobMasterId jobMasterId,
                                                                SlotRequest slotRequest,
                                                                Time timeout)
        Requests a slot from the resource manager.
        参数:
        jobMasterId - id of the JobMaster
        slotRequest - The slot to request
        返回:
        The confirmation that the slot gets allocated

      • registerTaskExecutor

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<RegistrationResponse> registerTaskExecutor(java.lang.String taskExecutorAddress,
                                                                                  ResourceID resourceId,
                                                                                  SlotReport slotReport,
                                                                                  Time timeout)
        Register a TaskExecutor at the resource manager.
        参数:
        taskExecutorAddress - The address of the TaskExecutor that registers
        resourceId - The resource ID of the TaskExecutor that registers
        slotReport - The slot report containing free and allocated task slots
        timeout - The timeout for the response.
        返回:
        The future to the response by the ResourceManager.

      • notifySlotAvailable

        void notifySlotAvailable(InstanceID instanceId,
                         SlotID slotID,
                         AllocationID oldAllocationId)
        Sent by the TaskExecutor to notify the ResourceManager that a slot has become available.
        参数:
        instanceId - TaskExecutor's instance id
        slotID - The SlotID of the freed slot
        oldAllocationId - to which the slot has been allocated

      • registerInfoMessageListener

        void registerInfoMessageListener(java.lang.String infoMessageListenerAddress)
        Registers an infoMessage listener
        参数:
        infoMessageListenerAddress - address of infoMessage listener to register to this resource manager

      • unRegisterInfoMessageListener

        void unRegisterInfoMessageListener(java.lang.String infoMessageListenerAddress)
        Unregisters an infoMessage listener
        参数:
        infoMessageListenerAddress - address of infoMessage listener to unregister from this resource manager

      • shutDownCluster

        void shutDownCluster(ApplicationStatus finalStatus,
                     java.lang.String optionalDiagnostics)
        shutdown cluster
        参数:
        finalStatus -
        optionalDiagnostics -

      • getNumberOfRegisteredTaskManagers

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Integer> getNumberOfRegisteredTaskManagers()
        Gets the currently registered number of TaskManagers.
        返回:
        The future to the number of registered TaskManagers.

      • heartbeatFromTaskManager

        void heartbeatFromTaskManager(ResourceID heartbeatOrigin,
                              SlotReport slotReport)
        Sends the heartbeat to resource manager from task manager
        参数:
        heartbeatOrigin - unique id of the task manager
        slotReport - Current slot allocation on the originating TaskManager

      • heartbeatFromJobManager

        void heartbeatFromJobManager(ResourceID heartbeatOrigin)
        Sends the heartbeat to resource manager from job manager
        参数:
        heartbeatOrigin - unique id of the job manager

      • disconnectTaskManager

        void disconnectTaskManager(ResourceID resourceID,
                           java.lang.Exception cause)
        Disconnects a TaskManager specified by the given resourceID from the ResourceManager.
        参数:
        resourceID - identifying the TaskManager to disconnect
        cause - for the disconnection of the TaskManager

      • disconnectJobManager

        void disconnectJobManager(JobID jobId,
                          java.lang.Exception cause)
        Disconnects a JobManager specified by the given resourceID from the ResourceManager.
        参数:
        jobId - JobID for which the JobManager was the leader
        cause - for the disconnection of the JobManager

      • requestResourceOverview

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ResourceOverview> requestResourceOverview(Time timeout)
        Requests the resource overview. The resource overview provides information about the connected TaskManagers, the total number of slots and the number of available slots.
        参数:
        timeout - of the request
        返回:
        Future containing the resource overview

      • requestTaskManagerMetricQueryServicePaths

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<Tuple2<ResourceID,java.lang.String>>> requestTaskManagerMetricQueryServicePaths(Time timeout)
        Requests the paths for the TaskManager's MetricQueryService to query.
        参数:
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the collection of resource ids and the corresponding metric query service path
